name: Don't Splat the Bat
description:
Don't Splat the Bat! is a game about falling down a hole, using echolocation to avoid rocks, and going deeper and deeper.

*Bugfix upload on 4/27/21 - AudioStreamPlayer2D *is* directional, and they were all placed at 0,0, which is why the sound was only playing out of the left ear.

- See in game menu for controls and tips (all under the "controls" menu)

- I have no clue why the web build seems to play all the sound far to the left side...

- All graphics were done by myself using Paint.net

- Made with Godot Engine https://godotengine.org/

- Sound effects generated by SFXR https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

- Credits for things I didn't make myself:

- Font: Megakris by Kris Keogh

http://www.kriskeogh.com

- Music: AI Generated by computoser

http://www.computoser.com (Music by computoser is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License  License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ )
